content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (4, -62)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (4, -62)) with 49 coal and 6 iron ore in its inventory, currently producing iron plates.

### Lab at position (0.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position (0.5, 0.5)) which requires power to operate and is currently not powered.

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position (2.5, 0.5))
- Small electric pole (position (3.5, 0.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position ) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure that the target entity has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. In this case, the furnace was full when trying to add coal.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check that all structures requiring power, such as the Lab, are connected to a power source. The Lab at position (0.5, 0.5) is currently not powered.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
